bibl.title: Literal and Extended Use of Kinship Terms in Documentary Papyri
bibl.note: Detailed examination of private letters (Nos 1-82). - 1. The Problem. - 2. Connection to Someone Other than the Writer or Addressee. - 3. Terms Always Used Literally. - 7. Sibling Terminology. - 8. Other Kinship Terms. - 9. Conclusions. - 10. Complications. - Pp. 174-175: Appendix. Summary of principles of kinship term usage. - Bibliography.
